use_cases: ["Searched for cphA genes in 2,627 wastewater-associated MAGs from the GEM dataset to assess prevalence of cyanophycin synthesis function", "Annotated MAGs for coding regions and function using prokka v1.14.6", "Categorized MAGs by ecosystem type metadata to analyze distribution of cphA genes across wastewater treatment contexts", "Identified genus-level taxonomic classifications of MAGs containing cphA genes using GTDB taxonomy", "Examined metadata limitations and category overlap issues in the GEM dataset for wastewater treatment system classification"]
